They got ₹10,000 in their accounts, but no jobs yet. Will Bihar vote for welfare or work?
description:
In Bihar, the government’s ₹10,000 cash transfer to women has sparked both celebration and anger. Some say Nitish Kumar’s welfare schemes have changed their lives, while others point to joblessness, migration, and rising frustration among youth.

In this vox pop from Patna, we ask voters what really matters before the 2025 Bihar Assembly elections: welfare or work? Hear unfiltered voices of women, men, and first-time voters as they talk about Nitish Kumar, Tejashwi Yadav, and the real issues shaping Bihar’s politics.

Dick Cheney: 'Darth Vader' who hated Donald Trump
description: Cheney died in November 2025 at the age of 84 from complications of pneumonia and heart disease. His family called him “a noble giant of a man.” His critics might call him the architect of ruin. But everyone agrees: he reshaped the American presidency, bent the arc of global history, and never once looked back. Long before Trump normalised authoritarian instincts in public, Cheney operationalised them in secret without even bothering to tweet about it. Cheney might have found redemption among Never-Trumper liberals, but for those who have to live in the world, Darth Vader has no redemption — only the haunting echo of the Imperial March.

Russian cardiologist reveals 6 daily habits behind heart failure in healthy people
description: Russian cardiologist Dr Yaranov highlights six hidden lifestyle factors impacting heart health. Poor sleep, air pollution, chronic stress, gum disease, food deserts and gut imbalances silently harm the heart. These modifiable risks can lead to heart failure even in those appearing healthy. Addressing these issues early can protect the heart before clinical disease emerges.

title: Big AI freebie: ChatGPT Go now free for 12 months in India; how to claim the offer
description: OpenAI is offering ChatGPT Go free for 12 months to users in India starting November 4, 2025. Eligible users include new sign-ups, free-tier users, and existing ChatGPT Go subscribers with accounts in good standing. The promotion provides access to GPT-5, advanced image generation, file uploads, data analysis tools, and custom GPTs at no cost. Users must add a payment method to redeem but won't be charged during the promotional period. This limited-time offer can be redeemed via web, Android, or iOS platforms.

title: Delhi gasps again: Cloud seeding, smog towers, odd-even — will any of it really clear the air?
description: Delhi grapples with its perennial pollution crisis, with various proposed solutions like cloud seeding, odd-even schemes, and smog towers facing scrutiny. Experts emphasize tackling major emission sources, including power, industry, transport, waste, and construction, advocating for cleaner fuels, vehicle electrification, and improved waste management.

title: Photo shows how Telangana bus crash trapped passengers; 19 dead
description: A horrific bus crash in Chevella left passengers trapped under tons of gravel after a truck collision. Survivors recount the terrifying moments of being buried alive, with rescuers taking nearly an hour to reach them. Many sustained severe injuries, including deep cuts and crushed limbs, in the devastating incident.

title: Pakistan to deploy new submarines in 2026 — what it means for India’s naval strategy
description: Pakistan's naval strength is set to significantly increase next year with the induction of eight advanced Chinese-made Hangor-class submarines, featuring air-independent propulsion. This development poses a challenge to India's current conventional submarine capabilities, which are still awaiting their own building plans to commence. The move enhances Pakistan's maritime A2/AD posture.

title: Meghan Markle’s friend reveals why Prince Harry looked upset at Dodgers game
description: Meghan Markle enthusiastically celebrated the Dodgers' World Series victory, captured in a video by her friend Kelly McKee Zajfen. While Meghan was seen dancing and cheering, Prince Harry appeared more subdued, sparking fan speculation about his team loyalties. The couple, who moved to California in 2020, were previously seen at Game 4, both sporting Dodgers caps.

title: Junagadh horror: Teen celebrates double murder; used sugar to decompose bodies
description: A 16-year-old boy allegedly murdered his elder brother and sister-in-law in Junagadh, then celebrated with liquor and buried their bodies. Investigators were shocked by his lack of remorse and detailed planning, including using sugar to accelerate decomposition and concealing the pit with cement. The juvenile also confessed to rape and selling stolen jewelry.

title: Charlise Springer breaks silence after Blue Jays' World Series heartbreak
description: The Toronto Blue Jays' World Series dream ended in heartbreak, but George Springer's wife, Charlise, offered a message of gratitude and pride. Her words highlighted the team's resilience and the lasting memories created, reminding fans that baseball's true value lies in connection and shared moments, not just wins. The team vows to 'run it back' next season.

title: Brittany Mahomes slams “disgusting” Bills fan stunt ahead of Chiefs vs Bills
description: Ahead of the Chiefs-Bills game, a past incident involving Brittany Mahomes and a fan display in Buffalo has resurfaced. She publicly condemned a disrespectful Kermit the Frog puppet mocking Patrick Mahomes, urging for basic decency. This reminder of respect underscores the intense rivalry, proving that even amidst fierce competition, human dignity remains paramount.
